pages.text: Growth Infusion initially speeds up the growth ticks of plants by channeling them with a beam of wild energy.$(br2)With modifiers, growth can be performed as an area of effect, grow animals or breed animals, and much more!$(br2)$(warning) Some plants will appear to accept growth but not actually grow, especially at night time.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:growth_infusion/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Growth Chance:$() Up to $(spell:growth_infusion/growth_ticks) additional ticks are given to a plant for every tick that the spell is channeled.$(br2)$(bold)Radius:$() With any of $(modifier:rampant_growth_i)$(), $(modifier:rampant_growth_ii)$() or $(modifier:arms_of_air)$() enabled, $(spell:growth_infusion/count) crops within an area of $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_x) and $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_y) vertically are selected for random growth every channeled tick.

$(bold)Radius Boost:$() For each growth modifier past the initial of $(modifier:rampant_growth_i)$(), $(modifier:rampant_growth_ii)$() or $(modifier:arms_of_air)$(), the radius of blocks searched is increased by $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_boost) blocks in all directions. This boost only applies to crops.$(br2)$(bold)Crops:$() With any of $(modifier:rampant_growth_i)$(), $(modifier:rampant_growth_ii)$() or $(modifier:arms_of_air)$() enabled, a random amount of additional crops from 0 up to (but not including) $(spell:growth_infusion/additional_count) are also grown.

$(bold)Breeding:$() With the $(modifier:rampant_breeding)$() modifier enabled, animals within a radius of $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_breed_x) and $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_breed_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_breed_y) vertically are placed into breeding mode.$(br2)$(bold)Animal Aging:$() With the $(modifier:incubation)$() modifier enabled, animals within a radius of $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_breed_x) and $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_breed_z) blocks horizontally and $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_breed_y) vertically are aged by at least $(spell:growth_infusion/SECONDS/animal_growth_base) second(s), with an addition of up to $(spell:growth_infusion/SECONDS/animal_growth_vary) second(s) also applied. This growth takes place every $(spell:growth_infusion/SECONDS/animal_growth_interval) second(s) while the spell is channeled.

$(bold)Villager Trades:$() With the $(modifier:false_night)$() modifier applied, up to $(spell:growth_infusion/village_count) villagers within a radius of $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_villager_x) and $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_villager_y) blocks horizontally and $(spell:growth_infusion/radius_villager_y) vertically have a $(spell:growth_infusion/PERCENT/villager_growth_base) chance to reset their trades for every tick the spell is channeled.$(br2)$(bold)Embiggen:$() With the $(modifier:embiggening)$() modifier enabled, targeting a mushroom or sapling has a $(spell:growth_infusion/PERCENT/embiggen_chance) chance per tick the spell is channeled to be grown into a giant version.
